1.00.name: wordpress/7feeds-news-ticker
1.00.description: 7feeds News Ticker is a flash-based tool that allows you to add vertical scrolling news, events, announces, press releases, and other content from any RSS feed to sidebar of your blog. 7feeds ticker is a highly configurable tool: supports themes, customizeble colors, titles, dimentions and advanced scrolling settings. Loads immediately and works smoothly. Enjoy!
